articles.description: Matt Weston cements his status as the best skeleton racer in the world as he makes history by winning Olympic gold in emphatic fashion in Cortina, securing Team GB’s first medal of the 2026 Winter Games.
articles.title: Matt Weston: Skeleton pilot wins emphatic Olympic gold for first medal GB medal of games

articles.description: Ilia Malinin, the red-hot favourite for men's figure skating gold, suffers a nightmare on the ice.
articles.title: 2026 Winter Olympics: Mikhail Shaidorov wins men's figure skating gold as 'Quad God' Ilia Malinin crumbles

articles.description: Pedro Neto scores a hat-trick as Chelsea ease their way into the FA Cup fifth round after comfortably beating Championship side Hull City.
articles.title: Hull City 0-4 Chelsea: Pedro Neto hat-trick and Estevao strike sends Blues into FA Cup fifth round

articles.description: After Igor Tudor agrees to take charge of Tottenham for the remainder of the season, BBC Sport takes a look at what supporters can expect to see from his side.
articles.title: Igor Tudor: What will new Tottenham manager bring to club?

articles.description: Lindsey Vonn says she is "finally feeling" more like herself but will require at least two more operations on the broken leg she sustained in a crash at the Winter Olympics on Sunday.
articles.title: Lindsey Vonn to undergo two more operations despite 'feeling' more herself

articles.description: BBC Sport F1 correspondent Andrew Benson assesses what we learnt  - and what we didn't - from the first pre-season test in Bahrain.
articles.title: F1 testing: What did we learn about the new cars?

articles.description: Manchester City vs Leicester City LIVE: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats Women's Super League game.
articles.title: Women's Super League LIVE: Manchester City vs Leicester City - radio commentary, updates, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Fabio Wardley will make the first defence of his world heavyweight title against Daniel Dubois in all-British affair on Saturday, 9 May in Manchester.
articles.title: Fabio Wardley vs Daniel Dubois: Pair in all-British heavyweight world title contest in Manchester

articles.description: NBA legend Chris Paul announces his retirement at 40, following a 21-year career, after being released by the Toronto Raptors.
articles.title: Chris Paul: NBA legend announces retirement at 40

articles.description: Why Anthony Elanga is loving his time at Newcastle following his £55m move from Nottingham Forest in the summer.
articles.title: Aston Villa v Newcastle: Anthony Elanga vows there's 'so much more to come'
